## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                   | Type                           | Default        |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------- | ------------------------------ | -------------- |
| `alignContent` | `align-content` | Where to align the content    | `"center" \| "end" \| "start"` | `'center'`     |
| `variant`      | `variant`       | The variant of the modal body | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`   | `'horizontal'` |
